description:
It does work. So if you are not worried about settings, go for it.

Those reviewers said it crashed, may not have run the "make_db" script. Will definitely crash if it has no picture database.
But changing the size of the tiles is incomprehensible, or doesn't work at all. The options dialog appears to allow setting tile size, but does nothing. Not for me.
summary: Works, but needs better config options

description: Looks like it would be great if there was a way to create the needed data base. I gave up trying and deleted the program.
I love this app, it does exactly what is says: making pictures out of a lot of smal pictures!
crashed, how to you render with only 1 photo anyways?
Puedes elegir la imagen de lienzo (aunque no las imágenes que conformarán el nuevo azulejo), pero de ahí no pasa, si le das a renderizar el programa se cierra.
